meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Greg Siek Chris McKillop Nancy Burke Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1042.

td.p: Greg Siek, an extension agent from Cleveland, Ohio
Chris McKillop, a management consultant from Toronto, Canada
Nancy Burke, a secretary from Buffalo, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,200)

tr.td: HISTORY
ROCK 'N' ROLL SONGS
PEOPLE
TENNIS
MATH
COLORFUL PHRASES

Nancy
Chris
Greg

Chris
Greg
